com.github.mdsimmo.bomberman.utils.Region

  • Packages that use Region 
    Package Description
    com.github.mdsimmo.bomberman.utils
    A few utility classes that could be helpful to any plugin

    • Uses of Region in com.github.mdsimmo.bomberman.utils

      Classes in com.github.mdsimmo.bomberman.utils that implement Region 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Box
      A box is a cuboid region of a single world.
      class  CombinedRegion
      A combined region takes the union of multiple regions.

      Region CombinedRegion.shift(int x, int y, int z) 
      Region Box.shift(int x, int y, int z) 
      Region Region.shift(int x, int y, int z)
      Creates a new region that is the same as this region but shifted by the specified amount.

      Constructor and Description

      Creates a combined region from multiple other regions.
